entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023
